item.text: Now I, Paul, appeal to you personally by the meekness and gentleness of Christ (I who am meek when present among you, but am full of courage toward you when away!)—

<st data-num="1161">now</st> I <st data-num="1189" class="">ask</st> that when I am <st data-num="3918" class="">present</st> I may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> have to be <st data-num="2292" class="">bold</st> with the <st data-num="4006" class="">confidence</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> (I <st data-num="3049" class="">expect)</st> I will <st data-num="5111" class="">dare</st> to use <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> who <st data-num="3049" class="">consider</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to be <st data-num="4043" class="">behaving</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="4561">human standards</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> though we <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">human beings</st>,<n id="2" /> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4754">wage war</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="4561">human standards</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063">for</st> the <st data-num="3696">weapons</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4752" class="">warfare</st> are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4559">human weapons</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> are <st data-num="1415">made powerful</st> by <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2506" class="">tearing down</st> <st data-num="3794" class="">strongholds</st>.<n id="3" /> We <st data-num="2506">tear down</st> <st data-num="3053">arguments</st><n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5313" class="">arrogant obstacle</st><n id="1" /> that is <st data-num="1869" class="">raised up</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="163">take</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3540" class="">thought</st> <st data-num="163" class="">captive</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> make it <st data-num="5218" class="">obey</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

We are <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st> to <st data-num="1556" class="">punish</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3876" class="">act of disobedience</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st> is <st data-num="4137" class="">complete</st>.

You are <st data-num="991">looking at</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">outward</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">appearances</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> is <st data-num="3982" class="">confident</st> that <st data-num="1438" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belongs</st> to <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, he should <st data-num="3049" class="">reflect</st> on <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again:</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">Just as</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> himself belongs to <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> do <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">somewhat</st> <st data-num="4053" class="">more</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> us<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3619" class="">building</st> you <st data-num="3619">up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2506" class="">tearing</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2506">down</st>, I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="153" class="">ashamed</st> of doing so.<n id="2" />

I do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> want to <st data-num="1380" class="">seem</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> though I am trying to <st data-num="1629" class="">terrify</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> my <st data-num="1992" class="">letters</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> some <st data-num="5346" class="">say</st>, “His <st data-num="1992" class="">letters</st> are <st data-num="926" class="">weighty</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2478" class="">forceful</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> his <st data-num="4983" class="">physical</st> <st data-num="3952" class="">presence</st> is <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="3056" class="">speech</st> is of <st data-num="1848">no account</st>.”<n id="2" />
Let such a person consider this: What we say by letters when we are absent, we also are in actions when we are present.

For we would not dare to classify or compare ourselves with some of those who recommend themselves. But when they measure themselves by themselves and compare themselves with themselves, they are without understanding.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">beyond</st> <st data-num="280">certain limits</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> will confine our boasting<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="3358" class="">limits</st> of the <st data-num="2583">work</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="3307">appointed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="3" /> that <st data-num="2185" class="">reaches</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="891">as far as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we were <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5239" class="">overextending</st> ourselves, as though we did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5348" class="">reach</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> we were the first to <st data-num="5348" class="">reach</st> <st data-num="891">as far as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> about <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3756" class="">Nor</st> do we <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="1519">beyond</st> <st data-num="280" class="">certain limits</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="2873" class="">work</st><n id="2" /> done <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="245" class="">others</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> we <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st><n id="3" /> that as <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> continues to <st data-num="837" class="">grow</st>, our work may be <st data-num="3170" class="">greatly</st> <st data-num="4050" class="">expanded</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2583">limits</st>,<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1519" class="">so that</st> we may <st data-num="2097">preach the gospel</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5238">regions that lie beyond</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, and <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> of <st data-num="2092">work already done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="245" class="">another person’s</st> <st data-num="2583" class="">area</st>.
But the one who boasts must boast in the Lord.
For it is not the person who commends himself who is approved, but the person the Lord commends.
